original_text: And Caleb said, “I will give my daughter Aksah in marriage to the man who attacks and captures Kiriath Sepher.”
korean_text: 갈렙이 말하기를 기럇 세벨을 쳐서 그것을 점령하는 자에게는 내 딸 악사를 아내로 주리라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: I will give my daughter Aksah in marriage
to the man who attacks and captures Kiriath Sepher
